com.vmware.vapi.metadata.metamodel

Interface Component

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.vmware.vapi.internal.bindings.CompletionStageService, ComponentTypes, com.vmware.vapi.bindings.Service
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ComponentStub

    public interface Component
extends com.vmware.vapi.bindings.Service, ComponentTypes, com.vmware.vapi.internal.bindings.CompletionStageService
    The Component interface providers methods to retrieve metamodel information of a component element.

    A component defines a set of functionality that is deployed together and versioned together. For example, all the interfaces that belong to VMware Content Library are part of a single component. A component element describes a component. A component element contains one or more package elements.

    The methods for package elements are provided by interface Package.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Component.FingerprintInvocation fingerprint(java.lang.String componentId)
      Retrieves the fingerprint computed from the metamodel metadata of the component element corresponding to componentId.
      Component.GetInvocation get(java.lang.String componentId)
      Retrieves metamodel information about the component element corresponding to componentId.
      Component.ListInvocation list()
      Returns the identifiers for the component elements that are registered with the infrastructure.

    • Method Detail

      • list

        Component.ListInvocation list()
        Returns the identifiers for the component elements that are registered with the infrastructure.

        Invocation Result:
        The list of identifiers for the component elements that are registered with the infrastructure. The return value will contain identifiers for the resource type: com.vmware.vapi.component.

        Returns:
        instance of Component.ListInvocation which upon invoke executes the above described list operation. The operation result or the operation error will be stored in the CompletionStageFuture that invoke returns.

      • get

        Component.GetInvocation get(java.lang.String componentId)
        Retrieves metamodel information about the component element corresponding to componentId.

        The ComponentData contains the metamodel information about the component and it's fingerprint. It contains information about all the package elements that are contained in this component element.

        Invocation Result:
        The ComponentData instance that corresponds to componentId.

        Parameters:
        componentId - Identifier of the component element. The parameter must be an identifier for the resource type: com.vmware.vapi.component.
        Returns:
        instance of Component.GetInvocation which upon invoke executes the above described get operation. The operation result or the operation error will be stored in the CompletionStageFuture that invoke returns.
        Throws:
        NotFound - if the component element associated with componentId is not registered with the infrastructure.

      • fingerprint

        Component.FingerprintInvocation fingerprint(java.lang.String componentId)
        Retrieves the fingerprint computed from the metamodel metadata of the component element corresponding to componentId.

        The fingerprint provides clients an efficient way to check if the metadata for a particular component element has been modified on the server. The client can do this by comparing the result of this operation with the fingerprint returned in the result of get(java.lang.String).

        Invocation Result:
        The fingerprint computed from the metamodel metadata of the component element.

        Parameters:
        componentId - Identifier of the component element. The parameter must be an identifier for the resource type: com.vmware.vapi.component.
        Returns:
        instance of Component.FingerprintInvocation which upon invoke executes the above described fingerprint operation. The operation result or the operation error will be stored in the CompletionStageFuture that invoke returns.
        Throws:
        NotFound - if the component element associated with componentId is not registered with the infrastructure.
